body:
### Describe the bug

```csharp
await Client.GetWorkflowHandle("does-not-exist").StartUpdateAsync(
    "does-not-exist", Array.Empty<object?>());
```

This throws an `AggregateException` due to our use of `ContinueWith`

comments.body: The internals of update have been rewritten since this so this no longer applies

title: [Bug] WorkflowHandle.StartUpdateAsync does not unwrap exception properly
